channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Sales Offline
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Sales Offline

item.title: CVE-2021-35611|2024-09-25T19:25:43.907Z -- oracle%20corporation -- sales%20offline
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Sales Offline product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Offline Template). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.1-12.1.3 and 12.2.3-12.2.10. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Sales Offline. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of Oracle Sales Offline. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.3 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).
